Row.Text: Wounded units can heal +10 HP in neutral and +20 HP in friendly territory.
Wounded units can heal +10 HP in neutral and +15 HP in enemy territory.

Replace.Text: +20% [ICON_Production] Production toward Ancient and Classical era melee, anti-cavalry, and ranged units.
+20% [ICON_Production] Production toward Ancient, Classical, Medieval, and Renaissance era melee, anti-cavalry, and ranged units.
+20% [ICON_Production] Production toward all melee, anti-cavalry, and ranged units.
+20% [ICON_Production] Production toward Industrial era and earlier melee, anti-cavalry, and ranged units.
+20% [ICON_Production] Production toward Ancient and Classical era heavy and light cavalry units.
+20% [ICON_Production] Production toward Industrial era and earlier heavy and light cavalry units.
+20% [ICON_Production] Production for all heavy and light cavalry units.
+40% [ICON_Production] Production toward Ancient and Classical era naval units.
+40% [ICON_Production] Production toward Industrial era and earlier naval units.
+40% [ICON_Production] Production toward all naval units, excluding Carriers.
